text: The Life of Agustín Lara () is a 1959 Mexican musical movie directed by Alejandro Galindo and starring Pilar Pellicer, Germán Robles, Lorena Velázquez, Ofelia Montesco, Tito Junco, Antonio Prieto, Sara Montes, Fanny Schiller. It was distributed by Promex. ==Other websites== * Category:1959 movies Category:1950s musical movies Category:Mexican musical movies
title: The Life of Agustín Lara
